title: Santa Cruz Canton, Ecuador
text: Santa Cruz is a canton in the <a href="Provinces%20of%20Ecuador">Ecuadorian province</a> of the <a href="Gal%C3%A1pagos%20Province">Galápagos</a>. Its area covers the islands of <a href="Baltra%20Island">Baltra</a>, <a href="Bartolom%C3%A9%20Island">Bartolomé</a>, <a href="Marchena%20Island">Marchena</a>, <a href="North%20Seymour%20Island">North Seymour</a>, <a href="Pinta%20Island">Pinta</a>, <a href="Pinz%C3%B3n%20Island">Pinzón</a>, <a href="R%C3%A1bida%20Island">Rábida</a>, <a href="Santa%20Cruz%20Island%20%28Gal%C3%A1pagos%29">Santa Cruz</a>, and <a href="Santiago%20Island%20%28Gal%C3%A1pagos%29">Santiago</a>. As of the 2006 Galápagos census, it has a population of 11,262.
